dict.string:
I'm Adri√°n Rubio Morlote. I'm from Mexico City.
I was born to be a developer...

At age 13, my father gave me an iPod Touch, I could say that's where all started, but my fascination for technology comes from way before that.
Surfing the web, I found out people "hacked" their iPhones/iPods to get all kinds of goodies. It was a whole community.
So I couln't resist.

They made all kind of things: apps, tweaks, themes... I wanted to be part of it.
But I didn't know a thing about making apps.
So I learned how to use Photoshop by myself and I made a few themes.
Until I made a theme called "Alit", which was really popular.
It was downloaded more than 800,000 times.

But I wanted to grow, I wanted to know how the hell could someone make a bunch of pixels react to a user's needs.
I wanted to learn how to program something.
